attributes.action: Implement MOTORWAY teaching and a separate MOTORWAY DRIVING TEST
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The standard of driving on the motorways in this country is now deplorable; there are a huge number of people who simply have no idea how to drive properly & safely. There are so many nervous or small minded drivers that SIT in the middle lane that the slow lane has become completely empty & redundant.  This causes huge tailbacks & means that the fast lane has become a solid line of cars trying to overtake these obstructions, rather than what it should be "an overtaking lane".  There should be a separate MOTORWAY DRIVING COURSE to be taken some time after passing your initial driving test & there should be an EXAM on MOTORWAY DRIVING.  This could test many things, but cover safe distances behind the car in front & pulling in immediately after overtaking so that we reclaim the use of the slow lane & effectively gain an extra lane on all of our motorways FOC. The situation is so bad we need an advertising campaign & reminders on the motorway to EDUCATE drivers what they are doing wrong!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
